page.title: 07People and Places
page.content:
What is the most common surname in our area?Our top four shows the number of families sharing each name. 1. Robson 33 2. Thompson 32 3. Brown 28 4. Smith 25
Mike Neville:has lived in Whickham for many years and is not only its best known local personality, but also one of the region's best known faces.As presenter of "Look North" he is seen five nights a week on BBC TV's regional magazine programme.Before joining BBC he had worked for the commercial rival,Tyne Tees TV. {Place Names: {Lobley Hill}OE a wooded hill slope. {Whickham}AS the village fold. {Sunniside}AS from the personal name Sunna or Sunnan. {Marley Hill}OE the boundary field.
